attributes.action: Re-introduce National Service for All able bodied persons once they reach 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of recent high profile 'YOB' attacks and murders, to bring back compulsory National Service between the ages of 18 and 21. The exceptions, possibly, would be for people who are atteneding university or are physically disabled

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
